definition: safe and sound/well
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to have bad intentions
to have good intentions
see 黃鼠狼給雞拜年|黄鼠狼给鸡拜年[huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2]
pinyin: huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2 , mei2 an1 hao3 xin1
containing_words.word: 黄鼠狼给鸡拜年，没安好心

sentences.english: Knowing that all is well within me.
What we are doing is their own well, each other interference.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在做的，就是各自安好，互不相扰。

sentences.english: I put the silencer on my gun and Jeff did the same.
sentences.chinese: 我在枪上装上消声器，杰夫也把消音器安好。

sentences.english: Once the walls of the room are up, let in the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 房子四壁一旦支起来，就把顶篷放下来安好。

sentences.english: I hope everything is going well and you are enjoying your life there in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你一切安好，在澳大利亚的生活也都顺心如意。

sentences.english: I fear the Greeks, even when bringing gifts.
sentences.chinese: 希腊人带礼物来，没安好心。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Festival is near, coolness comes, you may be safe.
sentences.chinese: 中秋已近，凉意渐浓，远方的你，可安好。

sentences.english: Both children were so quiet that McRae wondered if they were all right.
sentences.chinese: 两个孩子都很安静，麦克蕾都有点怀疑孩子是否安好。

sentences.english: So any crying wolf now is not in good faith.
sentences.chinese: 所以喊狼来了的人没安好心。

sentences.english: When the sky is met on the leaf, see her body well and then hurry to leave.
sentences.chinese: 天恒遇上叶烨，见她身体安好便匆匆离去。

sentences.english: He is always buying you expensive clothes, I'm afraid they are Greek gifts for you.
sentences.chinese: 他总给你买很贵的衣服，我怀疑他没安好心。

sentences.english: I will be hoping that this letter finds you, and finds you well. Your friend, Andy.
sentences.chinese: 我会一直希望这封信会找到你，并且发现你一切安好。

sentences.english: I'm in Isle of Wight now. Everything was ok. Don't worry about me.
sentences.chinese: 我方今仍然在怀特岛了，一切安好，不消忧虑。

sentences.english: And the guard on duty has assured us everything is fine.
sentences.chinese: 而且当班警卫向我们报告了一切安好。

sentences.english: Please let me have your address as soon as you are settled.
sentences.chinese: 请你一安好家就把地址告诉我。

sentences.english: Dear Padfoot, I hope you're all right.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的大脚板，希望你一切安好。

definition: concerned
in good health
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to take care of oneself
(literary) I trust you have been well since we last met
to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
honest/prudent/variant of 願|愿[yuan4]
to hope/to wish/to desire/hoped-for/ready/willing
to see each other/to meet in person
(of relatives or friends) to live far apart from each other
concerned/troubled/having sth on one's mind
to worry/to be on one's mind
safe and sound (idiom)
as before/as ever
to worry about/to be concerned about
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
